price: 23. Si Allah leur avait reconnu quelque bien, Il les aurait fait entendre ; et s’Il les avait fait entendre, ils se seraient tout autant détournés en s’opposant à (Ses enseignements).
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
translations: surely, He (would) have made them hear
surely they would have turned away
